channel.title: "Blast Pit" issue
channel.description: There's an issue on the level "Blast Pit" which can cause you to have to revert to an older save or, if all saves/autosaves take place after the issue occurs you have to restart the game. In the gas (door 2) and power (door 3) rooms you're supposed to enter the room and push the button so that one door closes and the other opens. You can push the button from outside the first door causing it to close and it can only be reopened from the button inside the room--the button outside the room doesn't work to open the door again.

item.title: "Blast Pit" issue
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I have moved your post into a new thread. Sorry for any confusion but we’d like to keep bug reports in this forum section. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: "Blast Pit" issue
item.dc:creator: Mortal_Wombat
item.description:
There’s an issue on the level “Blast Pit” which can cause you to have to revert to an older save or, if all saves/autosaves take place after the issue occurs you have to restart the game. In the gas (door 2) and power (door 3) rooms you’re supposed to enter the room and push the button so that one door closes and the other opens. You can push the button from outside the first door causing it to close and it can only be reopened from the button inside the room–the button outside the room doesn’t work to open the door again.

Read full topic
